SELECT p.prd_id AS prdId, p.prd_nm AS prdNm, p.cntnt AS cntnt, p.prd_prc AS prdPrc, p.prd_sl AS prdSl, p.stck AS stck, p.rdt AS rdt, p.del AS del, p.image_path AS imagePath, c.ctgr_id AS ctgrId, c.ctgr_nm AS ctgrNm FROM product p JOIN category c ON p.ctgr_id = c.ctgr_id
AND ( p.prd_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR c.ctgr_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
AND p.del = 'N'
ORDER BY p.prd_id DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET ${page * size}
SELECT * FROM product WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
